abstract:
Docker is a major driver of container virtualization and comes in very
handy for your day-to-day work with Python.

*Tags:* Big Data, Data Science, DevOps, Jupyter, Machine Learning

Scheduled on `thursday 14:50 </schedule/#thu-14:50-lounge>`__ in room
lounge
description:
| My Talk aims to introduce you to Docker and how it works, how you can
  use prebuild Images from the Docker-Hub and how you can make your own
  Images.
| In more Detail, the following Points will be covered:
title: Introduction to Docker for Pythonistas
